Task 7 (Widget Build Setup) is complete. Here is the summary:

**Commit:** `74dc7a5` on `main` -- "feat: set up Vite + Preact widget build pipeline"

**Files created:**
- `widget/vite.config.ts` -- Vite config with IIFE library mode, outputs to `../public/widget.js`
- `widget/package.json` -- Separate package (`@devtools/widget`), `type: module`, with `build` and `dev` scripts
- `widget/tsconfig.json` -- ESNext target, Preact JSX factory (`jsxImportSource: preact`)
- `widget/src/index.ts` -- Entry point: reads `data-project`/`data-pin` from script tag, creates shadow DOM host, mounts Preact Toolbar, starts interceptors
- `widget/src/toolbar/FloatingButton.tsx` -- Stub Toolbar component (fixed-position floating button placeholder for Task 8)
- `widget/src/interceptors/index.ts` -- Stub `initInterceptors()` placeholder for Task 9

**Files modified:**
- `package.json` -- Added `build:widget` script
- `tsconfig.json` -- Added `widget` to exclude (prevents conflicts with Next.js compilation)
- `.gitignore` -- Added `widget/node_modules` and `public/widget.js` (build artifact)

**Dependencies installed in widget/:**
- Runtime: `preact` (^10.28.3)
- Dev: `vite` (^7.3.1), `@preact/preset-vite` (^2.10.3), `typescript` (^5.9.3)

**Build verified:**
- `npm run build:widget` succeeds from root
- Output: `public/widget.js` -- 11.32 KB (4.92 KB gzipped)
- Root TypeScript (`npx tsc --noEmit`) still passes cleanly

**Architecture notes:**
- Shadow DOM isolation prevents host page CSS leaking into widget
- IIFE format self-executes on load; no external module system needed
- `document.currentScript` reads config attributes at load time
- Stubs are minimal but export the correct signatures so Tasks 8-9 can replace them without build changes
summary: Task 7 complete: widget build pipeline working
